p.d: Alix and Bibi go to a housewarming party organised by Maude, an old schoolfriend. She shows them around her new house, but it is the pink bedroom, for the future baby, which captures their attention. Director: Catherine White (season 1, Canada, 2016) Cast: Karelle Tremblay (Alix), Sophia Belahmer (Bibi), Maxime Desjardins-Tremblay (Keven), Jean-Carl Boucher (Dave/Danny), Vincent Fafard (Louis) Genre: drama
